JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a hardware focused Direct to Consumer (DTC) Operations Lead reporting directly to the Head of Chanel Operations.  This role will be responsible for leading operational and order to cash readiness activities for all stages of the product life cycle. To be successful in this role, the candidate will need to be able to effectively navigate the organization, identify and close process and systems gaps, influence internal and external stakeholders with data, have a good working knowledge of supply chain, logistics, operations, and expertise in the end to end and order to cash flows in support of direct to consumer (e-commerce) channels. This is an individual contributor and matrixed role.
